name: Partners in Parkour (ANDROID GAME)
description:
Partners in Parkour is an Android game to play with 2 people, it features Hat customization and 2 colours to play. There is 2 Derpy beans Daring to do parkour, to make it more daring, they go up high in the sky and make parkour platforms.

Mechanics and info:

This game was made to switch between players with the switch button.

Single-player is very difficult.
